name: Adventure Cookies
author: Jacki_In_Simi
summary: This is another recipe that mom made for us frequently, especially in the summer, because they are a 'no-bake' cookie and freeze well. We'd eat them straight out of the freezer and, man, were they good!
ingredients: 2 cups crispy rice cereal (such as Rice Krispies®)
1 (14 ounce) package sweetened flaked coconut (such as Bakers® Angel Flake®)
directions: Combine dates, sugar, milk, and butter in a saucepan and cook over medium-low heat until thick, 5 to 10 minutes
Add egg, vanilla extract, and salt to the date mixture; stir to combine
Add crispy rice cereal and walnuts and mix very well
Pour coconut into a shallow bowl
Shape the date mixture into balls and roll in the coconut
